description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

ProjectObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

ProjectObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

ProjectObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing basic project for update purposes only.

Basic_Project_Data.description: Project ID. This is the Project unique identifier
Free form text for a meaningful Project Name. Project Name must be unique.

validation.validation: Enter a Project name that is not already in use.

Basic_Project_Data.description: Boolean to indicate that Project is inactive

validation.validation: Can not switch an existing non basic worktag only project to be a basic worktag only.
validation.description: Can not switch an existing non basic worktag only project to be a basic worktag only.
